title: Jiminy's Is Fighting Climate Change One Pet Treat At A Time - Forbes
body: Jiminy's Chewy Cricket Treat. Jiminy's 2022. Carlson tells the story of Lauren, a millennial Jiminy's customer who refers to her dog Mordecai as "her son."

title: Looking for a more sustainable dog food? Try insects. | Grist
body: Q. Jiminy's is a pioneer and remains the only U.S. company offering complete-diet dog food made from insect protein. What were some of the challenges getting started? A.
